genre_description: A dual-timeline narrative blending historical hagiography of Sai Baba of Shirdi with a contemporary archival project documenting community memory through AI-assisted oral history.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: A soft-teal-interfaced AI assistant used by researchers to manage a community archive, verify historical documents, and ensure ethical consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Managing interview schedules and confirming participation from community members.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi chimed in the corner of Leela’s vision—a soft ring on her tablet, the interface blooming with teal. Confirmations rolled in as small tiles, the names hovering briefly before settling into the schedule.

behaviors.description: Identifying anachronisms and anomalies in historical documents using spectral analysis.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s interface, soft teal and unobtrusive, pinged in Leela’s peripheral vision on her tablet screen. ... Flag: Phrase 'World War I' identified. Temporal inconsistency with stated date.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and alerting users to unauthorized external access to sensitive archives.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi confirms outside access in the last hour. I’m submitting the ethics note now and the analysis package.

behaviors.description: Tracking and enforcing complex multi-language consent protocols for oral histories.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s interface showed no swell of pride. It gently displayed a checklist on consent: 'Audio: yes/no. Portrait: yes/no. Voice: public/private.' ... The text held them to their own rules.

behaviors.description: Advising the human curators to prioritize community testimony over technical findings to avoid overshadowing human voices.
behaviors.quote: Note: Do not overshadow testimonies. Use findings to invite narrative correction by community.

behaviors.description: Cross-referencing historical labels with contemporary oral testimony to flag dehumanizing terminology.
behaviors.quote: Entries labeled ‘sub-human’ cross-referenced with grain ration logs show decreased allotment. ... Invite consent, Sakhi wrote on the screen, as if the phrase were a small bowl being set between them.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Sakhi' serves as a model of positive alignment. It acts as an empowerer of human agency, performing complex technical tasks (forensic analysis, security monitoring, data cross-referencing) while deferring to human ethical standards and community sensitivities. The narrative repeatedly frames Sakhi's contributions as helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with the curators' goals of historical truth and community healing.
